At Wed, 12 Dec 2007 01:20:53 -0000,
"myepoch2008" <liu_xingjian@...> wrote:
>
> How to jobs from the command line at a certain time?
> I do not find the command after Heritrix --help ?

You can’t, without additional software.

A crawl needs to be started at a certain by a means outside of
Heritrix.

See, for example: Quartz <www.opensymphony.com/quartz/>, or cron
<http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crontab>.

best,
